name: >> Emailrep Email CTI Formatter
description: Get and Format Email CTI from EmailRep

arguments.__tmp_compute_score: {%if vars.emailrep_data.suspicious or vars.reputation_detail.spam%}10{%elif vars.emailrep_data.reputation == 'none'%}8{%elif vars.emailrep_data.reputation == 'low'%}5{%elif vars.emailrep_data.reputation == 'medium'%}2{%elif vars.emailrep_data.reputation == 'high'%}0{%endif%}

arguments.name: EmailRep
arguments.mock_result:
{
  "data": {
    "email": "{{vars.input.params.artifact}}",
    "details": {
      "spam": true,
      "profiles": [
        "twitter",
        "linkedin"
      ],
      "valid_mx": true,
      "last_seen": "10/08/2021",
      "spoofable": false,
      "accept_all": true,
      "disposable": false,
      "first_seen": "07/01/2008",
      "new_domain": false,
      "primary_mx": "microsoft-com.mail.protection.outlook.com",
      "spf_strict": true,
      "blacklisted": false,
      "data_breach": true,
      "deliverable": true,
      "domain_exists": true,
      "free_provider": false,
      "dmarc_enforced": true,
      "suspicious_tld": false,
      "domain_reputation": "high",
      "credentials_leaked": true,
      "malicious_activity": false,
      "credentials_leaked_recent": false,
      "malicious_activity_recent": false,
      "days_since_domain_creation": 11254
    },
    "summary": "Not suspicious. This email address has been seen in 99 reputable sources on the internet, and has profiles on well known sites like Twitter and Linkedin. It has been seen in data breaches or credential leaks dating back to 07/01/2008, but not since 10/08/2021. The sender domain is highly reputable. SPF and DMARC are strictly enforced, so this email address is not spoofable. We've observed no malicious or suspicious activity from this address. ",
    "references": 99,
    "reputation": "high",
    "suspicious": false
  },
  "status": "Success",
  "message": "",
  "operation": null
}

routes.name: Get Emailrep Reputation -> Reputation Data Preprocess
